display_long_description:
New Update !
Some optimization and UI changes have been made.

Important
You can use multiple applications simultaneously in normal 2048 mode. However, when RPG mode is active, I recommend not opening any application other than this game due to optimization issues. (I'm working on fixing this problem, sorry for the inconvenience).
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Everyone knows about 2048 but this time you are not only merging tiles but you are fighting with monsters.

Update features :
- You can play default 2048 game at any time. (RPG mode is seperated).
- In RPG mode you can eliminate monsters but be carefull they are getting stronger each wave so you need to get upgrades. (no in app purchases of course).

* 2048 is originally created by Gabriele Cirulli
* 2048 RPG Enemies designed by Burak Ozturk
* 2048 XR Developed by Sener Projects
